techmeme.title: How Tencent's MoreFun Studios, on the verge of collapse a decade ago, is fueling the company's ambitions to create "evergreen" global gaming franchises (Bloomberg)
German online fashion retailer Zalando agrees to buy About You, a smaller rival, for ~€1.2B, or €6.50 per share, a ~67% premium on December 10's closing price (Deirdre Hipwell/Bloomberg)
How niche communities globally are repurposing WhatsApp, including broadcasting news and shows, matchmaking, organizing prayers, and finding blood donors (Sonia Faleiro/Rest of World)
Singapore-based auto financing marketplace CarDekho SEA, a unit of India's CarDekho, raised $60M at a $300M valuation, its first external raise since founding (Kate Park/TechCrunch)
An investigation into the suicide of a Minnesota man details how an online terrorist network called 764 has used Discord to find and torment vulnerable people (Washington Post)
